entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
